channel.title: Login at same time glitch
channel.description:
it won't let them login if the person is already online HOWEVER if 2 clients login to the character at the same exact time, both will log in, making 2 characters, causing twice as many items on both the characters
anyone no how to fix this?
ps: yes i no i posted this b4, but i never got a good enough answer
